disability.title: Living with disability or illness
disability.summary: Whether you are newly disabled or have a lifelong challenge, assistance may be available, including financial help.
disability.secondaryHeadline: Federal Benefits for Persons with Disabilities or an Illness
disability.eligibilityCriteriaDescriptio: For the most accurate results, select the options that best describe your or the person applying for benefits situation. The list of benefits will reorder to prioritize the benefits you are most likely eligible for.
